channel.title: Emotes, what class?
channel.description:
Ok, I guess my client has custom emotes, because when using the normal emotes (dance etc) ingame, I get some wierd emote. Yes, I already changed the emote in my actionbuttons, but I just get another wierd emote.
So. In what class are the custom emotes located? I would like to delete them.
Regards,
SirPali

item.title: Emotes, what class?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Hmm. Pretty sure it uses the crappy 74.dat replacement.

Ah well. Finally realised my source and client sucks anyway. Time to find something new

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes, what class?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

your client probably has the shitty old godsword stances method(the 74.dat replacement)

but if you are using swats emote system, all the custom emotes are located in class20.java

Read full topic
